title: Divinity II: Developer's Cut
notes: Very laggy in menu and in game. Turning off Vsync fixed that. Cutscenes do not play. You can skip through them by pressing escape, otherwise your screen will have a still image for a bit. Everything gameplay-wise works. Mediocre performance. 1080p/35-50fps

title: Divinity II: Developer's Cut
notes:
Error during the installation of VC Redist "error creating process msiexec /i vcredist.msi"

Game doesn't start

title: GRID
notes: Set graphics preset to Ultra, afterwards change resolution to 1280x720 and Antialiasing to 2xMSAA, works perfect after that.
